page.title: Blue Chips Open Down; Oil Near \$48
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - Blue-chip stocks opened slightly lower on Thursday, with rising energy prices feeding investor concerns, but the Nasdaq index opened higher after software company Cognos Inc. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=COGN.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">COGN.O</A> posted better-than-expected earnings.
